text: Battleground (2014) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming show made by WWE. It took place on July 20, 2014 at the Tampa Bay Times Forum in Tampa, Florida. It was the second Battleground event held by WWE and the first to also stream live on the WWE Network. ==Background== Battleground featured professional wrestling matches involving different wrestlers from pre-existing scripted feuds, plots, and storylines that played out on WWE's television programs, Raw and SmackDown. The wrestlers portrayed good guys, bad guys or tweeners (morally ambiguous characters) as they followed a series of events which lead to a wrestling match or a series of wrestling matches. ==Results== ==References== ==Other websites== *Battleground Website Category:2014 in American television Category:Sports in Tampa, Florida Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2014 in professional wrestling Category:2014 in Florida Category:2010s in Tampa, Florida Category:July 2014 events
title: Battleground (2014)
